content: winter white coat page 1 winter white coat finished size designed to fit bunny doll and frog see yarn note yarn note this coat will fit any of my animal dolls to make sure of a good snug fit choose the same weight yarn and one needle size up from the size you knitted your animal doll in for example from a 2 75mm to a 3mm will also fit croc doll rabbit doll moley shrew kitten doll piglet mice yarn - this is a guide to what i used for my coat yarn a main colour tiny amount 4-ply weight in off-white i used drops alpaca shade 0100 off-white yarn b trim tiny amount faux fur yarn in off-white i used ricorumi furry furry in white knitting needles pair size 2 25mm/ us size 1 gauge 14 row x 10 stitches over 2 5cm/ 1in with 2 25mm/ us size 1 knitting needles and yarn a extras 2 x small safety pins or a circular knitting needle for holding stitches when not in use yarn sewing needle tiny buttons or beads © claire garland © dot pebbles knits winter white coat page 2 winter white coat page 3 pattern notes & tips general abbreviations i generally cast on with cable cast on unless it s casting on in the middle of a k = knit row then i use backward loop cast-on method p = purl increase = increase decrease = decrease k2tog/ k3tog = knit two together/ knit three together p2tog/ p3tog = purl two together/ purl three together rh/lh = right hand/ left hand rs/ws = right side/ wrong side st/ sts =stitch/ stitches skpo = slip one stitch knit next stitch pass slipped stitch over knit stitch to decrease by one stitch kfb = knit into front then into back of stitch to increase by one stitch pfb = purl into front then knit into back of stitch to increase by one stitch winter white coat page 4 winter white coat page 5 beginning with the neck edge with yarn a cast on 26 sts rs facing rejoin yarn a to 29 sts on your left needle continue as follows row 1 *k2 p1** repeat from * to ** to last 2 sts k2 to end of row row 23 kfb k7 kfb twice k10 kfb turn row 2 *k2 p1** repeat from * to ** to last 2 sts k2 to end of row right sleeve row 3-10 beginning with a knit row work eight row stocking stitch row 24 purl 14 left sleeve sts turn row 11 k1 kfb k7 kfb k1 four times kfb k7 kfb k1 - 33sts row 25 k1 kfb k10 kfb k1 turn - 16 right sleeve sts row 12 purl row 26 pfb p14 pfb turn - 18 right sleeve sts row 13 k1 kfb knit to last 2 sts kfb k1- 35sts row 27 k1 kfb k14 kfb k1 turn - 20 right sleeve sts row 14-15
